## Description
 &#10;&#9;&#9;Allophane is an amorphous to poorly crystalline hydrous aluminum&#10;&#9;&#9;silicate clay mineraloid. Its chemical formula is Al2O3·1.3-2·H2O. A regolith derived mineral deposit

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Ore|
|Form:|Solid|
